title: Growthwheel Business Planning Tool
description: Proposers must show assessors & voters an auditable  business plan, but most do not have business planning experience.
solution: Growthwheel is a widely used tool for small businesses in the US, Europe, Africa and Asia. Access to these robust tools solves the problem.
experience: I am a certified Growthwheel Consultant. Successful serial entrepreneur and angel investor willing to mentor projects or introduce GW.
